Detailed Description

A generic ticket for monitoring asynchronous requests.

Thread Safety
Not Thread-safe. May not be shared across threads.

Member Function Documentation

+ (id) emptyTicket

Return an empty request ticket.

Calling cancel on this ticket will have no effect.
